description: Numbers n such that summatory Liouville function L(n) (A002819) is zero.
comments: a(253) > 2 * 10^14 according to the calculations of Borwein, Ferguson, & Mossinghoff.  Most likely a(253) = 351100332278250. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 14 2011L(23156358837978983978) = 0 and L(n) < 0 for n from 2.3156354 * 10^19 to 23156358837978983977. - _Hiroaki Yamanouchi_, Oct 03 2015
links: Donovan Johnson and Hiroaki Yamanouchi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..317312 (a(1)-a(252) from Donovan Johnson)
